trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> starts running.
trans-unit.target: Funge da contenitore per un gruppo di attività che viene eseguita quando il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> viene avviata l'esecuzione.
Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateInitializationActivity acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Il StateInitializationActivity agisce come un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>a tutte le attività che contiene.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the StateInitializationActivity.

If a StateInitializationActivity exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the StateInitializationActivity is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
trans-unit.target: Se esiste un StateInitializationActivity in un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, il StateInitializationActivity è la prima attività che viene eseguita quando il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>Avvia l'esecuzione.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: In some ways the StateInitializationActivity is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
trans-unit.target: Alcuni aspetti di StateInitializationActivity è ad esempio un `OnEnterState` gestore.

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Il StateInitializationActivity non è un'attività obbligatoria in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the StateInitializationActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: È il StateInitializationActivity un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, ovvero il StateInitializationActivity può contenere altre attività.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: Il StateInitializationActivity non può contenere qualsiasi attività che implementa il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>interfaccia, che include tutti <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>le attività e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>attività.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: A StateInitializationActivity is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.
trans-unit.target: Cui viene eseguito un StateInitializationActivity il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, un modo non bloccante che rende il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>pronto a ricevere gli eventi.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
trans-unit.target: Il StateInitializationActivity può contenere un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>attività, in modo da poter modellare una macchina a stati in cui si verifica una transizione da uno stato senza ricevere alcun evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>

trans-unit.source: In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
trans-unit.target: In tal senso la macchina a stati si comporta come un flusso di lavoro sequenza.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
